text: we're here in San Denis in the north of

it all began at 20 passed four in the

sustained gunfire for more than an hour
these are the latest pictures that we

raid and it was a very very dramatic
indeed and it was flat here an apartment

targeted by the police operation it's
understood they'd had some sort of

hameed abode the man thought to be the

information has been coming to us in the

there was a woman who quite early on in

it seems may well have been shot by

and a man and a woman outside the flat
as well it's a whole series of arrests
that police say they're still trying to

were also fears that either the building

surrounding buildings may have been
